```{r setup}
library(ProjectSTSCI4520)
```

```{r}
# get station id for Ithaca weather station
ithaca_index <- grep("Ithaca", station_info$`station name`)
ithaca_info <- station_info[ithaca_index,]
ithaca_id <- ithaca_info$WBANNO

# get weather data for Ithaca in 2020
ithaca_2020_data <- get_station_weather(ithaca_id, start_date = "2020-01-01", end_date = "2020-12-31")
print(head(ithaca_2020_data))


# get yearly cycle averages for Ithaca without a leap day
ithaca_yearly_cycle <- get_yearly_cycle(ithaca_id)
print(head(ithaca_yearly_cycle))

#
temperature_trend(ithaca_id)
```
